name: 𝐷𝑖𝑐𝑡𝑎𝑚𝑛𝑢𝑠 𝑎𝑙𝑏𝑢𝑠
description:
𝐷𝑖𝑐𝑡𝑎𝑚𝑛𝑢𝑠 𝑎𝑙𝑏𝑢𝑠 name is given by Carl Linnaeus in 1753.
It's also known as Gas Plant, got this name thanks to the special flammable gas it secretes. 
It is European Siberian element but the photograph is taken at 1000 m in Mediterranean region. 
What makes it special is the evidence of the Anatolian diagonal, which Peter Handland Davis put forward and it explains one of the mechanisms of evolution.
Isolation Mechanism...
